description:
For the season (and maybe series) finale, the first Totally Tesagure Grand Prix is held, a competition to find and reward the funniest member. Except one key cast member is missing, Yua is punchy from lack of sleep, and Aoi is more sharp-tongued than ever!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Let`s Play with a Totally Tesaguri Grand Prix
MAJIてさぐりグランプリで遊ぼう
Maji Tesaguri Grand Prix de Asobou
